Becker et al. [ 16] proposed a non-parametric approach to this method using the discrete version of Eq. ( 2). Let the number of HIV infections in the ith time interval be I
i and the probability mass function of the incubation period be f
d . Then, the expected number of AIDS diagnoses in interval i can be described as
